data.force_refresh: Force a refresh of entities on every read (may impact performance)

error.invalid_yaml: Invalid YAML. Please check your input.

send_message.name: Send Message
send_message.description: Send a Message to the EHS Sentinel system. Ensure the key and value are correct.

nasa_key.name: Message Key
nasa_key.description: The key for the message. From the Nasa repository, e.g., NASA_POWER

nasa_value.name: Value
nasa_value.description: The value to send. In hex representation, e.g., 0x01 for 1

source_address_class.name: Source Address Class
source_address_class.description: Source Address Class for the message (default: 0x80 for JIGTester).

destination_address_class.name: Destination Address Class
destination_address_class.description: Destination Address Class for the message (default: 0x20 for Indoor).

destination_address.name: Destination Address
destination_address.description: The destination address for the message. This is the last byte of the Indoor Address.

destination_channel.name: Destination Channel
destination_channel.description: The destination channel for the message.W.

packet_type.name: Packet Type
packet_type.description: The packet type for the message.

data_type.name: Data Type
data_type.description: The data type for the message.

request_message.name: Request Message
request_message.description: Request a message from the EHS Sentinel system.

nasa_key.name: Message Key
nasa_key.description: The key for the requested message. From the Nasa repository, e.g., NASA_POWER

request_diagnostic_logs.name: Request Diagnostic Logs
request_diagnostic_logs.description: Request the current diagnostic logs from the EHS Sentinel service for troubleshooting purposes.

development_tools.name: Development Tools
development_tools.description: Tools for development and troubleshooting. Use these functions with caution as they may impact performance.

tool_name.name: Tool Name
tool_name.description: Name of the development tool to execute.

import_fsv_file.name: Import FSV File
import_fsv_file.description: Import an FSV file to update the EHS Sentinel configuration. The file must be in the Home Assistant config/www/ehs_sentinel/logs directory.

file_name.name: File Name
file_name.description: Name of the FSV file to import (e.g., config_fsv.yaml). The file must be located in the Home Assistant config/www/ehs_sentinel/logs directory.

export_fsv_file.name: Export FSV File
export_fsv_file.description: Export the current EHS Sentinel configuration to an FSV file. The file will be saved in the Home Assistant config/www/ehs_sentinel/logs directory.

file_name.name: File Name
file_name.description: Name of the FSV file to export (e.g., my_config.fsv). The file will be saved in the Home Assistant config/www/ehs_sentinel/logs directory.
